languages.text:
At the end of each turn, the most {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} restores up to 50% of its strength.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.
languages.original_text:
В конце каждого хода самый поврежденный сектор {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} восстанавливается до показателя 50%.
Продолжительность: +1 раунд за каждые 10 очков в навыке Техника у офицера на посту.

traits.locale_text: At the end of each turn, the most damaged sector of the Flagship's shields restores up to 50% of its strength.

At the end of each turn, the most {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} restores up to 50% of its strength.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.

Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.

Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.

languages.text:
В конце каждого хода самый поврежденный сектор {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} восстанавливает до 50% от максимального заряда.
Продолжительность: 2 раунда +1 раунд за каждые 20 очков навыка Техника у офицера на посту.
languages.original_text:
At the end of each turn, the most {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} restores up to 50% of its strength.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the post officer's Tech-Use skill.

languages.text:
Am Ende jedes Zugs stellt der am meisten {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}beschädigte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schildsektor{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} bis zu 50 % seiner Stärke wieder her.
Dauer: 2 Runden +1 Runde für jede 20 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Tech-Einsatz des Schildmeisters.
languages.original_text:
At the end of each turn, the most {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} restores up to 50% of its strength.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} stellt der am meisten beschädigte Schildsektor des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} bis zu 50% seiner Stärke wieder her.

Am Ende jedes Zugs stellt der am meisten {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}beschädigte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schildsektor{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} bis zu 50 % seiner Stärke wieder her.
Dauer: +1 Runde für jede 10 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Tech-Einsatz des Schildmeisters.

Am Ende jedes Zugs stellt der am meisten {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}beschädigte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schildsektor{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} bis zu 50 % seiner Stärke wieder her.
Dauer: +1 Runde für jede 10 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Tech-Einsatz des Schildmeisters.

languages.text:
À la fin de chaque tour, le secteur le plus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}endommagé{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} recouvre jusqu'à 50 % de son intégrité.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points de la compétence Technomaîtrise du maître des boucliers.
languages.original_text:
At the end of each turn, the most {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} restores up to 50% of its strength.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.

traits.locale_text:
À la fin de chaque tour, le secteur le plus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}endommagé{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} recouvre jusqu'à 50 % de son intégrité.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Techno-utilisation du maître des boucliers.

À la fin de chaque tour, les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du secteur le plus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}endommagé{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} regagnent jusqu’à 50 % de leur force.
Durée : +1 round par tranche de 10 points dans la compétence Technomaîtrise du Maître des Boucliers.

À la fin de chaque tour, le secteur le plus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}endommagé{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} recouvre jusqu'à 50 % de son intégrité.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Techno-utilisation du maître des boucliers.

languages.text:
每个{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}回合{/g}结束时，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}护盾受损最严重的区域最多可恢复50%的{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}强度。
持续时间：两轮，护盾大师每有20点科技使用技能，持续时间延长一轮。
languages.original_text:

Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Shield Master's Tech-Use skill.

languages.text:
Al final de cada turno, el sector más {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dañado{/g} de los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} recupera un 50 % de su potencia.
Duración: 2 asaltos +1 asalto por cada 20 puntos de Uso de tecnología del Maestro de escudos.

languages.text:
各{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ターン{/g}の終了時、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の最もダメージを受けたセクターのシールドの{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}強度{/g}が最大50%回復する。
持続時間：2ラウンド。シールドマスターの技術使用スキル20ごとに+1ラウンド。

languages.text:
Her turun sonunda {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanlarından{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarlı{/g} sektör, kuvvetinin en fazla %50'sini geri kazanır.
Süre: 2 raunt ve Kalkan Ustası'nın Tekno Aşinalığı yeteneğindeki her 20 puan için +1 raunt.
